channel.title: Monstascape Development!
channel.description:
[center]Welcome To my Development thread Monstascape will be based off of the latest version of Devolution. the base Devolution was chose due to some good features and its somewhat good stability i believe. this will be more PK driven yet it will also be fun, exciting, and challenging.[/center] [center]Server Information Release date: UNKNOWN Hosting Playernt Will Host It Until We Have Enough For Vps. Last Version We Got Money WIthin A Week.[/center]
Economy Economy is what keeps the server going correct? Well in this server i will aim for a decent economy with no overpowered items and costs for an item being too high or too low. Also there will be requirements to use some items such as doing a quest, or having membership. PKing will be a major source of income and it is how you will be able to get some items not found in the shops and such. But I Will Be Coding Rare Item Drops Such As Ruined Dragon Peices To Allow Skills To Correspond Into The Economy.
Minigames/Quests there will be a number of Quests and custom Minigames. Some Quests Will Open Area's For new Training Spots And Or Minigames.
Updates: June 4: [ul][*]Perfect THeiving With Stall Delays. [*]Fresh new Client With 377 Cache. No Overlaying Models In Cache. [*]Add Handlers To Reduce Client.java Size By About 100kb -Objecthandler -ItemOnItem -ItemOption -ItemOnObject [*]Slayer Was Started. [*]Glory + Slayer Ring Created. [*]Karajam Dungeon Finished. [*]jframe Added To Client [*]class8 in client cleaned out for fresh start. [*]all items in client have noted version. [*]More To Come! ___________________________________ June 5th: [*]Redid My Object Handler. [*]Fixed Some Minor Glitches. [*]Deleted Some Unnecicary Code. [*]Switch Some More If Statements Into Switches. ___________________________________ June 6Th [*]Went To Six Flags - lol ___________________________________ June 7th [*]Removed All Unnesisary Npc's. [*] Added max Money. - Don't Know What To Add. ___________________________________ June 8th [*]Learned Not To Mess With Objects With The Suite, Messes Up Object Options [*]Fixed Gmaul Inventory Model. [*]Messed Around With Client For The Night. ___________________________________ June 9th [*]Did Nothing, Did Make Sure Models Were Correct Since The Switch ___________________________________ June 10th [*]Played Around With Ground Textures. [*]Looked At Some Interfaces.[/ul] Pictures: new Client Items. [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/Untitled-11.jpg[/img] Slayer Start. [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/l-2.jpg[/img] Client Item Options. [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/o.jpg[/img] Gem Crafting(Correct Animations Added Later) [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/t-1.jpg[/img] Dragon Plate Smithing.(Also Have SPirit Shield + Dfs) [IMG]http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq345/theinjuredonee/u.jpg[/img] [u][i][b]I Got My COmputer To Host. Will Be Doing A Small Beta Over The Weekend.[/b][/i][/u] Beta: Check The Forums.

item.title: Monstascape Development!
item.dc:creator: @poopsicle100 poopsicle100
item.description:
@poopsicle100 wrote:

Kihomura:

Way to mix 500+ items in with a 474 look-alike client used for playing on a 317 server.

474 look-alike client? can you not see? are you blind? that looks nothing like a 474 client. its galkons base client. and i like some 500+ items but i do not go over the edge with them.

Only Ones In THere Are

-dclaws(they like, im not to found of them)
-dplate(i kinda like)
-Spirit Shields(i think there cool)
-Dragonfire Shield(wat server doesn’t have
-godswords(again everyone has)
-Torso + Defenders

Read full topic

item.title: Monstascape Development!
item.dc:creator: @poopsicle100 poopsicle100
item.description:
@poopsicle100 wrote:

[center]Welcome To my Development thread
Monstascape will be based off of the latest version of Devolution. the base Devolution was chose due to some good features and its somewhat good stability i believe. this will be more PK driven yet it will also be fun, exciting, and challenging.[/center]

[center]Server Information

Release date: UNKNOWN

Hosting
Playernt Will Host It Until We Have Enough For Vps. Last Version We Got Money WIthin A Week.[/center]

Economy

Economy is what keeps the server going correct? Well in this server i will aim for a decent economy with no overpowered items and costs for an item being too high or too low. Also there will be requirements to use some items such as doing a quest, or having membership. PKing will be a major source of income and it is how you will be able to get some items not found in the shops and such. But I Will Be Coding Rare Item Drops Such As Ruined Dragon Peices To Allow Skills To Correspond Into The Economy.

Minigames/Quests

there will be a number of Quests and custom Minigames. Some Quests Will Open Area’s For new Training Spots And Or Minigames.

Updates:

June 4:

[ul][]Perfect THeiving With Stall Delays.
[]Fresh new Client With 377 Cache. No Overlaying Models In Cache.
[]Add Handlers To Reduce Client.java Size By About 100kb
-Objecthandler
-ItemOnItem
-ItemOption
-ItemOnObject
[]Slayer Was Started.
[]Glory + Slayer Ring Created.
[]Karajam Dungeon Finished.
[]jframe Added To Client
[]class8 in client cleaned out for fresh start.
[]all items in client have noted version.
[]More To Come!

June 5th:
[]Redid My Object Handler.
[]Fixed Some Minor Glitches.
[]Deleted Some Unnecicary Code.
[]Switch Some More If Statements Into Switches.

June 6Th
[*]Went To Six Flags - lol

June 7th
[]Removed All Unnesisary Npc’s.
[] Added max Money. - Don’t Know What To Add.

June 8th
[]Learned Not To Mess With Objects With The Suite, Messes Up Object Options
[]Fixed Gmaul Inventory Model.
[*]Messed Around With Client For The Night.

June 9th
[*]Did Nothing, Did Make Sure Models Were Correct Since The Switch

June 10th
[]Played Around With Ground Textures.
[]Looked At Some Interfaces.[/ul]

Pictures:
new Client Items.

Slayer Start.

Client Item Options.

Gem Crafting(Correct Animations Added Later)

Dragon Plate Smithing.(Also Have SPirit Shield + Dfs)

I Got My COmputer To Host. Will Be Doing A Small Beta Over The Weekend.

Beta: Check The Forums.

Read full topic
